channel.title: Join today Whrath-pvp / pk server no eco
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Welcome to Whrath-pvp[/size]
Whrath-pvp is a new oldschool pk server with aspirations of redefining your rsps experience. All the content you can ask is here and more to come. Many custom pvp areas
website: [url=http://devil-reality.com/]http://devil-reality.com/[/url] (still under construction)
client : [url=http://devil-reality.com/.cm4all/iproc.php/Whrat-PVP.jar?cdp=a&cm_odfile]http://devil-reality.com/.cm4all/iproc.php/Whrat-PVP.jar?cdp=a&cm_odfile[/url]
Features
- 100% perfect combat - Packet pvp - 24/7 uptime - PK supplies and locations - donator Ranks and benefits - Unique oldschool style - Wilderness locations - Great community - PK shops

All the content you can ask is here and more to come. Many custom pvp areas
